texts.t: At the beginning of my career I mastered the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript within a month, after which I was able to make my first project. I afterwards had experience of learning how to use and implement various libraries (PIXI.js, Babylon.js) in a short period of time and to work with unfamiliar legacy code.
confirmed by international certificates (IELTS, CAE). I speak English fluently and, besides, am capable of reading and discussing technical documentation.
I am always ready to look for solutions to problems, even to the most difficult ones, and to propose ideas for improvement.
I enjoy learning new technologies and taking on non-trivial tasks.
